== Thomas Meire ==
I'm 20 years old and live in Ostend (Belgium). I study informatics at <nowiki>[[http://www.ugent.be|Ghent-University (UGent)]]</nowiki>.

== Interests ==
At the moment, most of my intersts are in the foss-domain. I'm a member of <nowiki>[[http://zeus.ugent.be|Zeus WPI]]</nowiki> (the workgroup informatics of the UGent, who's major goal is to help students with their computer related problems). I was their webmaster in 2006-2007.
